actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to provide that the voluntary conversion from oil or gas to an alternate fuel by a stationary source shall be treated in the same manner as a conversion ordered under the Energy Supply and Environmental Coordination Act of 1974 or the Powerplant and Industrial Fuel Use Act of 1978.

summary.text: Amends the Clean Air Act to provide coequal treatment, under Federal law, for a stationary source voluntarily converting from oil or natural gas to an alternate fuel and a stationary source mandated to convert.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to provide that the voluntary conversion from oil or gas to an alternate fuel by a stationary source shall be treated in the same manner as a conversion ordered under the Energy Supply and Environmental Coordination Act of 1974 or the Powerplant and Industrial Fuel Use Act of 1978.
